scripts.transpile-only: babel src --out-dir cocos/src --source-maps && babel main.js --out-dir cocos/ --source-maps
scripts.transpile: npm run clean && npm run transpile-only && npm run update-project
scripts.win32-build: npm run transpile && npm run cmake && cd cocos/build && MSBuild GaloJs.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform="win32"
scripts.build: npm run transpile && cd cocos && cocos.bat run --proj-dir . -p web
scripts.release: cd cocos && cocos.bat compile -p web -m release
